name: Knight of Rock & Paper & Scissors
description:
Find your way out in this action/reflexion game where you'll need to face dangerous slimes. Break the stones to earn their power and defeat your enemies. But careful, each power has his strengths and weaknesses. 

Controls:

Move: WASD/left joystick/arrow

Attack: CTRL LEFT/Button A (xbox controler)

Restart level: R/Start (xbox controler)

Leave: Escape/Back (xbox controler)
